summary.title: Engineering Director
summary.bio: Two decades in, from coding to leading - that's my tech journey. As I shifted from software engineer to engineering leader, I discovered the magic that happens when tech meets business. Today, I'm focused on building robust teams that can effectively leverage technology, and I'm committed to fostering a company culture that's primed to craft products with a grand vision.
